name: A Wizard's Life (MemoryGhost)
description:
This is our final year project as game design students. It's called "A Wizard's Life". A narrative exploration game where you play as a wizard named Blyth. Take a journey through this colourful world of voxels and get ready to collect and create potions to help people around the world.

It has truly been a pleasure to work on this alongside my peers. Let us know what you guys think... 

Creators: 

Payal Chana 

Juliette Eleanor Love 

and myself Rayyan Gafoor
